Package ru.geekbrains.hexcore.core

Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
ru.geekbrains.hexcore.core.service.GameEngine
public class GameEngine extends Object
Game engine. Class that is supposed to be a game judge. Makes players taking turns one by one. Includes MovementEngine and BattleEngine that implement any additional logic for moving and fighting correspondingly.

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer (Player player)
      Add players to the engine

    • getWinner

      protected Optional<Player> getWinner()
      Returns game winner if any. Basic implementation just checks whether there is a looser with no units alive
      Returns:
      Player that still has units while another one has not, or empty Optional if no such Player

    • start

      public void start()
      Main method that starts and continues game till it's ended by getWinner method

    • moveUnit

      public void moveUnit (Unit unit, Path path)
      Proxies request to MovementEngine
      Parameters:
      unit - unit to be moved
      path - path which must be used to move
